code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{suggestCars}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SuggestButton=()=>{const[fuelType,setFuelType]=useState('');const[capacity,setCapacity]=useState('');const[cars,setCars]=useState('');const[suggestedCars,setSuggestedCars]=useState('');const fetchCars=async()=>{const response=await suggestCars(fuelType,capacity);setCars(response.data);};const handleSuggest=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await fetchCars();setSuggestedCars(cars);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSuggest,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Suggest Car"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:fuelType,onChange:e=>setFuelType(e.target.value),placeholder:"Fuel Type",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:capacity,onChange:e=>setCapacity(e.target.value),placeholder:"Capacity",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"suggest"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cars.map(car=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[car.name,"-",car.fuelType,"-",car.capacity]},car.id))})]});};export default SuggestButton;
